author: Al Jazeera
title: South Korea sees slight decline in new coronavirus cases
description: South Korea has largely contained virus by enlisting the public's support, being transparent and testing.
content:
South Korea is continuing to see a slight decline in new coronavirus cases on Wednesday, but that news is tempered by emerging clusters of infected patients, according to a media report.
But the East Asian nation's largely successful approach has been hailed… [+102 chars]
